com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.saf.extension
Interface IImplementationHandlerService

public interface IImplementationHandlerService

Method Summary
 com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.sca.Component createComponent(java.lang.String implementationKind, com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.sca.Composite composite)

Method Detail

findAllImplementationHandlers

AbstractImplementationHandler[] findAllImplementationHandlers()
Returns an array of AbstractImplementationHandler for all supported implementation kinds.

Returns:
an array of implementation handlers

findImplementationHandlerForKind

AbstractImplementationHandler findImplementationHandlerForKind(java.lang.String implementationKind)
Returns the AbstractImplementationHandler for the implementation kind specified. The handler provides information about the implementation kind that could be presented to an end user. If no implementation handler supports the kind passed, null is returned.

Parameters:
implementationKind - the implementation kind whose handler is returned
Returns:
the handler for the specified implementation kind

findImplementationHandlersForObject

AbstractImplementationHandler[] findImplementationHandlersForObject(java.lang.Object forObject)
Returns an array of AbstractImplementationHandler for the object specified. Think of this as a bottom-up approach. It returns an array of AbstractImplementationHandler which can create an Implementation starting from the object passed. The enablement expression specified during the extension definition should match the object specified. The handler returned provides information about the implementation kind that could be presented to an end user. If no implementation handler supports the object passed, null is returned.

Parameters:
forObject - the object from which an implementation can get created (bottom-up approach)
Returns:
the handler for the specified object

createComponent

com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.sca.Component createComponent(java.lang.String implementationKind,
                                                   com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.sca.Composite composite)
                                                   throws SAFException
Creates a default component of the specified kind and adds it to the passed composite. The caller should be prepared to change the name and display name of the returned component, or set both if they are not yet set.

Parameters:
implementationKind - the QName string of the implementation type
composite - the Composite that will own the resulting component.
Returns:
the newly-created component
Throws:
SAFException - when no handler for the specified type is found, or the handler throws an exception
